title: Presidential Nomination Sent To The Senate, 7-23-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 23, 2009

 



Presidential Nomination Sent To The Senate, 7-23-09




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  ________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                    July 23, 2009  NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:   Ketanji Brown Jackson, of Maryland, to be a Member of the United States Sentencing Commission for a term expiring October 31, 2013, vice Michael E. Horowitz, term expired.
